mapper.select: SELECT ESTID, SALECODE, MAINCATEGORY, SUBCATEGORY, NAME, AMOUNT, MENUPRICE, SUMPRICE, QUICKPRICE FROM BDETAILSALES WHERE ESTID =#{estid} AND SALECODE =#{salecode}
SELECT ESTID, SALECODE, MAINCATEGORY, SUBCATEGORY, NAME, AMOUNT, MENUPRICE, SUMPRICE, QUICKPRICE FROM BDETAILSALES WHERE SALECODE =#{salecode}

SELECT DISTINCT ${category} FROM BDETAILSALES WHERE ( (#{category} = 'subcategory' AND MAINCATEGORY =#{maincategoryname} AND SALECODE = #{salecode} ) OR (#{category} = 'maincategory' AND SALECODE = #{salecode} ) ) ORDER BY ${category}
